P.A.L. [Police Athletic League] Ball [20 negatives in 13 sleeves]
Annual benefit for the Police Athletic League of New York City, a non-profit youth development agency, held in the ballroom of the Sheraton-East Hotel.

Subjects: Alemany, Carlos Benedict, Vicki Bogert, Beverly Brooks, Harry A. Brukenfeld, Jane Butler, Mrs. Robin Chapman, Richard D. Davie, Mrs. T. Bedford (former Diana Wing) Granger, Mrs. Wm. G. Holzer, Leonard Lamkin, Marguerite McGrath, Mrs. Gordon R. Melhado, Mrs. Frederick Phipps, Nonie Rayner, Wm. G. and Mrs. Reeves, Joan (daughter of Mrs. T. W. Blake) Santangelo, Michael Stewart, Serena
P.A.L. [Police Athletic League] Ball [20 negatives in 13 sleeves]
